name: Nonorelia
storyline:
Noah Von Sterne is no stranger to setbacks, nor toil, nor catastrophe. An inhospitable planet located at the very edge of Lyran space is no one’s idea of a vacation home, but he and his family are a bright bunch, and for decades Nonorel V has functioned as a hub for interstellar shipping and manufacturing. The monotony is broken, however, when a massive explosion of unknown origin nearly levels the Von Sternes’ compound, leaving few facilities intact and even fewer inhabitants alive to witness the destruction. Forced to wade through the body-strewn wreckage of his home, Noah refuses to give up just yet.
​
What could have caused this disaster?
What will become of his home? His family?
Does Noah have what it takes to fix this mess?

…Or is it already too late to turn back?
summary: A logic puzzle game and sci-fi visual novel rolled into one. Solve nonograms to overcome obstacles as Noah Von Sterne struggles to save his colony and reunite his family, or unwind and sharpen your mind with our relaxing Picture, Random, and ASMR Modes.
